output:

I wanna tell you what's going on now

Love is all that I can give to you
It's a joy and poetry

I could love you for a million years

We haven't felt this way, put this away for years

I wanna tell you what's been and gone and
Love is all that I can give to you
It's a joy and poetry
And there's no one there to dry the tears
